page.title: 10Marconi Radar
page.content: The most conspicious land-mark in the whole of our area is{Marconi Radar on Bushy Hill. It can be seen from Christian's bedroom, Stow Maries church and our school playground. After our teachers had signed in, Mr Powell showed our school party all the equipment used on this testing ground. On the site there are radars from the 2nd World War up to the most modern cylindrical radar used on ships. The most impressive has a huge bowl and can pick up signals from aircraft 100 miles away. Inside the buildings was the equipment used to motivate the radar and five scanners which show the signals on a screen. A special pen placed over these signals showed the height of the aircraft and their flight numbers.
